Former secretary of state and chairman of the joint chiefs of staff Colin Powell offered praise for Barack Obama 's accomplishments but refused to say whether he would endorse Barack Obama or any of the emerging Republican hopefuls in 2012. Right now I do not see on the Republican side any one individual that will emerge at the top of the pile, Colin Powell said, adding that he is not committed to any candidate.
